data.meta_description: It’s little surprise to Texas Values Action President Jonathan Saenz that Texas House Speaker Joe Straus and House State Affairs committee Chairman Byron Cook announced today that they would not be seeking re-election. Said Saenz: “The writing was already on the wall. After 50-plus county Republican parties have censored or issued statements criticizing Speaker Straus...
